text: when you are building an app you know
that your users probably have more than
one device maybe a smartphone for the
work commute and tablet for enjoying
downtime later being able to sync your
users profile information whether that
save game data or some other kind of
information is really important so the
users can have a great experience with
your app whenever and wherever they use
it regardless of which device they use
but building the backend you need to
support that kind of storage and
synchronization is a lot of work you
have to build it deploy it and manage
the infrastructure that are runs on
wouldn't it be great if you could stay
focused on riding your app without
having to build your own back-end just
to support syncing and storing users
data introducing Amazon cognito Amazon
cognito is a user identity and data
synchronization service that makes it
really easy for you to manage user data
for your apps across multiple mobile or
connected devices you can create
identities for users of your app use
public login providers like Google
Facebook and Amazon and the service also
supports unauthenticated identities
users can start off trying your app
without logging in and then when they do
create a profile using one of the public
login providers their profile data is
seamlessly transfer you can use Amazon
cognito to save any kind of user data
and key value pairs whether that's a
preferences game state or anything that
makes sense for your app with Amazon
cognito you don't have to worry about
running your own back-end service and
doing with identity network state
storage or sync issues you just save the
user data using the Amazon cognito API
and seek it and that's it the users data
is securely synced and stored in the AWS
cloud it's really easy to use Amazon
cognita with your app instead of taking
months to build a solution yourself it
just takes a few lines of code to be
able to sync your users data if you're
using other eight of us services amazon
cognito provides you
even more benefits like delivering
temporary credentials with limited
privileges that users can use to access
aite abuse resources to save you having
to worry about credential management
amazon cognito lets you focus on
building your app and making sure that
your users have a consistent experience
regardless of the device they're using
without you having to worry about the
heavy lifting associated with building
your own back-end solution to sync user
data with the AWS free tier you'll get
10 gigabytes of storage and 1 million
sinks per month for free for your first
12 months to get started with Amazon
cognito visit our website today
